MGDrivE 0.1.0
  • Reference

Inheritance Cube: ECHACR

Cube_eCHACR.Rd

This function creates an ECHACR construct, it has 5 alleles at the first locus and 4 alleles at the second.

  • W: Wild-type

  • H: Homing allele

  • E: Eraser allele

  • R: No-cost resistance allele

  • B: Detrimental resistance allele

  • eH: Rate of homing from H, W -> H transition

  • eE: Rate of homing from E, H -> E transition

  • pRH: Generation of R alleles during homing, from H

  • pBH: Generation of B alleles during homing, from H

  • pRE: Generation of R alleles during homing, from E

  • pBE: Generation of B alleles during homing, from E

Cube_eCHACR(eH = 1, eW = 1, eC = 1, eCH = 1, eCW = 1, eCC = 1,
  pRH = 0, pBH = 0, pRW = 0, pBW = 0, pRC = 0, pBC = 0, pRCH = 0,
  pBCH = 0, pRCW = 0, pBCW = 0, pRCC = 0, pBCC = 0, d = 0,
  eta = NULL, phi = NULL, omega = NULL, xiF = NULL, xiM = NULL,
  s = NULL)

Arguments

eH

Homing efficiency of drive allele at locus 1
eW

Homing efficiency of ECHACR element at locus 2
eC

Homing efficiency of ECHACR element into homing allele at locus 1
eCH

Homing efficiency of drive element in presence of ECHACR element
eCW

Homing efficiency of ECHACR element in presence of 1 homing allele into new allele at locus 1
eCC

Homing efficiency of ECHACR element in presence of 1 homing allele and 1 not at locus 1
pRH

No-cost resistant allele generation rate
pBH

Detrimental resistant allele generation rate
pRW

No-cost resistante allele from eW
pBW

Detrimental resistant allele from eW
pRC

No-cost resistance allele from eC
pBC

Detrimental resistant allele from eC
pRCH

No-cost resistance allele from eCH
pBCH

Detrimental resistant allele from eCH
pRCW

No-cost resistant allele from eCW
pBCW

Detrimental resistant allele from eCW
pRCC

No-cost resistant allele from eCC
pBCC

Detrimental resistant allele from eCC
d

Background mutation rate from W,H, and E into R allele
eta

Genotype-specific mating fitness
phi

Genotype-specific sex ratio at emergence
omega

Genotype-specific multiplicative modifier of adult mortality
xiF

Genotype-specific female pupatory success
xiM

Genotype-specific male pupatory success
s

Genotype-specific fractional reduction(increase) in fertility

Value

Named list containing the inheritance cube, transition matrix, genotypes, wild-type allele, and all genotype-specific parameters.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
